songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Let's love
I love you, you love me
Let's be friends, yeah
No tears
I am you, you are me
Let's be clear
We run through the flowers
Barefoot, screaming
Like Mother Earth, I love you

[Refrain]
I love you, I love you
I love you, I love you
I love you, I dunk you
Why we just don't

[Chorus]
Cruise where we want to
Say what we want to
Laugh like a psycho
Love on the set falls
Healing with indigo
Healing with all this hope
We won't take this anymore
We just have to go, we
From third to forth
From six to seven
This isn't happening
No, no, no

[Verse 1]
Let's love
I love you, you love me
Let's be friends
No tears
I am you, you are me
Let's be clear
We run through the flowers
Barefoot, screaming
Like Mother Earth, I love you

[Refrain]
I love you, I love you
I love you, I love you
I love you, I dunk you
Why we just don't

[Chorus]
Cruise where we want to
Say what we want to
Laugh like a psycho
Love on the set falls
Healing with indigo
That why we need to go
From third to forth
From five to six
From six to seven
We know this isn't happening
We know this isn't better
We know

[Pos-Chorus]
Let's live in harmony
It's hard to be in a World that doesn't respect these trees
Therefore don't respect me
